content.rendered:
MEET ECHHA JOSHI

Echha Joshi is a clinical nutritionist & a wellness expert. Her passion for nutrition stems from a desire to help people live a pain-free life absent of chronic illnesses. Guided by scientific, evidenced-based nutrition therapy and powerful yoga practices, Echha helps her clients manage common diseases like Cancer, Diabetes, Obesity, Heart and kidney disorders & Arthritis. She believes, with the right knowledge and an optimistic approach, leading a healthy life can be quite simple. She invites you to break out of old, unhealthy habits and develop a positive relationship with your body in her expert guidance. 

“My experience with my body is similar to every woman’s, but my ways are effective because I changed my life using these techniques.”

Hi, I’m Echha Joshi and i’d love to tell you a little about my life.

My journey has been similar to a lot of women out there. I got married young, gave birth to my three daughters and raised them while i was working to build a better life for my family. The rigours of raising a family and managing my work made me neglect my health completely and I faced problems like weight gain, slipped disc and depression. That’s not all though, I developed ovarian cysts that had to be removed surgically at a point in my life.

I was stressed, I hated how I looked and my body had become a host to multiple diseases. I consulted with various health professionals, doctors and dieticians to find a solution but I was left tired and frustrated. If I really think about it, no one really told me why my body was working against me, no one helped me understand what is going on with me. They would slap me with a mix of pills and generic diet plans that further lowered my self-esteem. 

In a quest to find real answers, I began reading and learning more about health. 

I stumbled upon various studies on the role of nutrition in preventing and managing illnesses. When that started making sense to me, I decided to pursue the study of nutrition academically. Believe it or not, I implemented a lot of what I studied in my life and that’s when I started seeing real positive changes. What surprised me the most was that it’s actually not that complicated to achieve your health goals when you’re equipped with the right tools. Somewhere along my journey to rediscover true health, I found my passion. I completed my professional training in clinical nutrition and dietetics and I have played a pivotal role in driving people towards a healthier life ever since. I had a chance to transform many beautiful lives while I heard their stories and gained an insight into their minds. My purpose is to help you avoid all the confusion and setbacks that I experienced and rediscover true health.

Areas of Specialisation

Weight loss/weight management

PCOS management

Cancer care

Type-2 diabetes reversal/management

Infertility care

Stay connected with me

Load More... Follow on Instagram

@graph.name: About Echha Joshi - Best Nutritionist & Dietitian in India
@graph.description: Echha Joshi is a clinical nutritionist & a wellness expert. Her passion for nutrition stems from a desire to help people live a pain-free life. Best Diet Consultant.

@graph.name: Echha Joshi
@graph.description: As a clinical nutritionist, my passion for personalized nutrition is driven by my unwavering commitment to helping individuals achieve optimal health and wellbeing. With a Postgraduate degree in Clinical Nutritional Sciences and a Master's degree in Clinical Nutrition, I possess an extensive understanding of the impact of different foods and nutrients on the body, and how they can be utilized to prevent and treat a range of health conditions. My approach to nutrition is both precise and tailored to each individual's unique needs. My personalized nutrition counseling takes into account medical history, lifestyle, and personal preferences, providing guidance that is both effective and enjoyable. I am experienced in working with individuals who have a wide range of health concerns, including diabetes, heart disease, and gastrointestinal disorders. Beyond my work in individual counseling, I am committed to promoting the importance of nutrition for overall health and disease prevention. My insights and expertise have been widely recognized and respected in the field, with several publications featuring my contributions. If you are seeking a refined, evidence-based approach to nutrition, I would be honored to connect with you. Together, we can work towards achieving optimal health and wellbeing, unlocking your full potential for a healthier and happier life.
